query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicles) as total_veiculos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'active') as veiculos_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM funcionarios) as total_funcionarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM funcionarios WHERE cargo LIKE '%motorista%') as total_motoristas;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicles) as total_veiculos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'active') as veiculos_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM funcionarios) as total_funcionarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM funcionarios WHERE cargo LIKE '%motorista%') as total_motoristas;
